item.title: NEET 2025 Syllabus
item.description: Download the official NEET 2025 syllabus to prepare for your exams. Source: nmc.org.in

item.title: NEET 2025 Exam Date and Important Information
item.description:
NEET 2025 will be held on 4th May 2025.
The exam duration is 180 minutes from 2 PM to 5 PM.
Submission of application forms is open from 7th Feb to 7th Mar.
No correction facility will be provided after registration.
Extra time will not be given for filling out the OMR sheet.
Be extremely careful while filling out the application form.
NTA is ensuring strict regulations this year.

item.title: Correction Window for NEET (UG)-2025 is LIVE!
item.description: NEET (UG)-2025 Correction Window is now open. Candidates can make necessary corrections to their application forms. Source: neet.nta.nic.in

item.title: Clarification on Question Paper Pattern and Examination Duration for NEET (UG)-2025
item.description: Official clarification regarding the question paper pattern and examination duration for NEET (UG)-2025 has been released. Candidates are advised to review the details. Source: neet.nta.nic.in

item.title: Reminder for NEET(UG) 2025 Registration
item.description: Reminder: The registration window for NEET (UG) 2025 is closing soon. Ensure you complete your application before the deadline. Source: neet.nta.nic.in
